purpose: Facilitate the development and deployment of generalist AI agents for various tasks and domains.
principle: Built on TypeScript, Suna leverages modular architecture to allow for flexible agent creation and integration with various AI models and APIs.
reusability: Designed with modularity in mind, Suna supports plugin-based architecture and offers APIs for easy integration and customization.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and stability issues, and might not cover all edge cases.
name: suna
description: Suna - Open Source Generalist AI Agent
highlight: Suna is a versatile AI agent framework that allows for the creation and orchestration of generalist AI agents.
